title: For Sale:  IWB Kydex Holster for Glock 19/23/32, 17/22/31, 34/35, 26/27 right or left hand
postcontent:
This is a custom handmade IWB Kydex Holster that is made for a Glock 19/23/32 but, can fit a Glock 17/22/31, 34/35, 26/27. This holster is ambidextrous. The strut and belt loop can be changed for either left or right handed shooters. Retention is crisp around the trigger guard to secure the firearm without movement. 

-This has been made with .080 Kydex which offers sturdiness and a solid feel. 
-The edges have been sanded and so that there are no rough edges. 
-Can be cleaned easily with soap and water
-Amount of Kydex is kept to a minimum to reduce bulk when carrying.
-2 Adjustable screws that can change the retention level.
-The fold over belt loop is adjustable to three settings and is made with a polymer injected strut.
-The belt loop can be adjusted for either 1.25", 1.5" or 1.75" belt widths.
-The screws and strut can be removed and changed to the other side depending on what side you carry on.
-50% sweat guard to protect you on both sides from abrasions.
-The loop can be swiveled to allow for a forward cant to your liking.
-Tuck your shirt over the holster to totally conceal the firearm while in the holster.

These holsters are $40 plus shipping, email orders to REDACTED

Custom holsters and knife sheaths available. 

Holster modeled by my 120 lbs son for affect.

The Izhmash Saiga autoloading shotgun incorporates the Kalashnikov design, providing reliability and simplicity of operation. Redfield Revenge 2-7x34mm 4-Plex Rifle Scope 115204 is an ideal rifle scope for close to medium range hunting in low light situations. The advanced, fully multi-coated lens systemimage of these Redfield rifle scopes results in a high light transmission rate that gives you high contrast, high clarity images even when the sun is just rising or setting. The highly adaptable accuracy of these riflescopes is achieved with the use of pop-up windage and elevation turrets, both of which can be easily reset to zero. Like many other scopes in the Redfield Revenge series, the Redfield Revenge 2-7x 4Plex Reticle Riflescope features fast focus eyepieces that both improve your target acquisition speed and give you a plentiful field of view so you can see your entire surroundings. Redfield has equipped this scope with the simple but effective 4-Plex reticle, which sports thick crosshairs with a slightly thinner center to increase target visibility. As with all Redfield Revenge rifle scopes, the 2-7x34mm variety is waterproof, shock-proof, and nitrogen filled for state of the art fogproofing. For all your short to medium range hunting needs, you can attain pinpoint accuracy in almost any conditions with the Red Field Revenge 2-7x34 Fast Focus Four Plex Scope.

title: For Sale:  Romanian FPK Dragunov
postcontent:
Up for sale is a number matching Romanian Dragunov with scope, sling,hard case, cleaning kit and scope cover. 
TG Knox TN is Tennessee Guns, importer located in Tennessee.

This is NOT a kit rifle. This one must have come in before feds put the stop on importing complete PSL rifles from Romania. How do you check? EASY! A kit rifle would have a receiver that was made in US of A, such receiver would have information about company that made the receiver, their name, their location, their serial number (that usually different from the original, in this case Romanian, serial number). To my knowledge, TG imported things, it never made their own receivers so the rifle you are looking at has the Romanian receiver and matching serial numbers verify that. And there is the fall back in the Made in Romania statement to top it off. Kit rifle would not say made in Romania.
No trade offers please.

postcontent:
I am trying to find my old duty weapon, a Glock 22, gen 3, serial number LPD 0501. It will have our 'City of Louisville' logo on the front of the slide. I had this same gun in my hand when I received my career-ending injury, so you can imagine the sentimental value it has for me.
If you have this Glock, or know where it it, pleas contact me!
Thank You!

1983–1984 Browning B-80 Ducks Unlimited

A well-made and popular gun very similar to the Beretta A303, the B-80 was discontinued only because the Browning-Beretta partnership ended. This dinner gun has a 2 3/4-inch chamber, a 30-inch full-choke barrel, high-grade walnut, and a DU grip cap. The receiver is decorated by famous Browning engraver Jose Baerten and features a bronze medallion with a white-fronted goose by David Maass. "The Plains" designation marks this gun as the third of four in DU's "Flyway" series.

This custom quality blade was a put out by ZT in an extremely limited quantity. The m390 blade steel is one of the highest quality steels on the planet. The frame of the knife is made completely from titanium and carbon fiber inserts. This is what bladehq has to say"
"The Zero Tolerance 0801CF Flipper is a Limited Edition version of the Todd Rexford designed 0801 knife. It is outfitted with 6K twill weave carbon fiber inserts on the titanium handle. The handle is finished with a dark bronze PVD coating and sports a black tip-up pocket clip. The premium M390 steel blade is two-tone finished with satin grinds and dark bronze PVD coated flats. The 0801CF shares the same great KVT ball-bearing system as the 0801. It provides slick action and the solid titanium frame lock mechanism has a stainless steel lockbar insert to extend the performance and longevity of the knife. This is an incredible knife from the folks at Zero Tolerance"

These knives are next to impossible to find. My knife is in pristine condition with the original box and paperwork. It has sat in my safe until now. These knives in this condition are escalating in value quickly to to the scarcity. I am in search of a sig sauer 2 tone p938 or other like handguns.
